articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: Edd Straw's 2024 F1 Bahrain Grand Prix driver rankings - The Race
articles.description: A new Formula 1 season means it's once again time for Edd Straw to rank the performances of all 20 drivers across qualifying and the grand prix, starting with the Bahrain GP:
articles.content:
A new Formula 1 season means it's once again time for Edd Straw to rank the performances of all 20 drivers across qualifying and the grand prix.
